newsitem.title: USA: Chateau Properties still evaluating offers.
newsitem.headline: Chateau Properties still evaluating offers.

text.p: Chateau Properties Inc chief executive officer C.G. Kellogg hopes to complete an evaluation of merger offers by Manufactured Home Communities and Sun Communities Inc "in the month of September."

Kellogg told Reuters in a brief telephone interview that the company will respond to the offers when it completes its review, which also includes an evaluation of Chateau's definitive merger agreement with ROC Communities Inc.
"We've been given direction by the board to give side-by-side comparisons for all three deals," Kellogg said.
He declined to be more specific about timing on the evaluations, but said the review process was taking longer than initially anticipated.
"I wouldn't hold my breath" for an immediate response, he added.
In July, Chateau and ROC agreed to merge in a tax-free stock swap, with shareholders for each firm trading their shares for those of a newly formed company, Chateau Communities Inc.
